album.title: The Sky Is Crying
album.artist: Stevie Ray Vaughan and Double Trouble

track.name: Life By The Drop

artist.name: Stevie Ray Vaughan and Double Trouble

comments: Oh man, gerade jetzt, diese Stück ... Erinnerung.

After he got straight, life by the drop never seemed sweeter, and he gave it all he had to whoever would listen. It took balls to share his story and speak out﻿ against drugs. But that was just Stevie. His guitar couldn't say that, so he had to speak up... :)
i can not say it too many times he was 1 of the best
laid outside in the pouring rain......livin' life by the drop    RIP- Debbie

such a simple song. but i's one of my SRV faves.

RIP my friend.
CAN'T STOP TIME CAN'T HURRY IT UP

he gets straight and then he dies that sucks  i saw his last concert  alpine valley ampitheater august 1990 jimmy vaughn robert cray srv and eric clapton awesome line up awesome show then his helicopter crashes r.i.p.
Love this song !!!!!! Living our dreams!!
Great 12 string acoustic blues by SRV
love my good ole bubba bourbon.
